r.d: Stagehand_DirectoryScanner provides a framework to process anything for files and directories under the specified directory.
r.n: The features of Stagehand_DirectoryScanner 1.1.0 is the same as Stagehand_DirectoryScanner 1.0.0 except the version number and the directory structure. As of this version, the sources are located directly under the "php_dir" (PEAR directory).
